meanings.definition: of or relating to the humerus bone
meanings.sent1: The humeral bone is connected to the shoulder.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the humeral injury carefully.
meanings.sent3: The humeral bone decided to take a break from supporting the arm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a humeral sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The humeral connection between the arm and shoulder is crucial for movement.

meanings.definition: a humerus bone or part of the body
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his humeral after the fall.
meanings.sent2: The humeral provides structure and support to the arm.
meanings.sent3: The humeral bone told a joke to the ribcage, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The humeral of the mountain range stretched far and wide.
meanings.sent5: She could feel the humeral of the skeleton model during anatomy class.
